title: BITS Pilani Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: Birla Institute of Technology and Science (BITS Pilani) has announced the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech in Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, applicatio...
